titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: MONTHLY EXTRACT TOTAL COST (PATIENT LEVEL INFORMATION COSTING) - Description

div.p: MONTHLY EXTRACT TOTAL COST (PATIENT LEVEL INFORMATION COSTING) is the same as attribute FINANCIAL AMOUNT for purposes of reporting Patient Level Information Costing.
MONTHLY EXTRACT TOTAL COST (PATIENT LEVEL INFORMATION COSTING) is the total sum of the costs within the monthly extract submitted for the Patient Level Information Costing System Acute Data Sets.
